activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.

ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: She never st'ir's the soup with a metal spoon.
This careless trainee always b'ur'ns the milk.
The chef often adds  fresh h'er'bs to the curry.
The dietician always keeps  c'ur'd in a cool place.

activity_2.focus: Simple Present - third person singular , Nationalities

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the capital cities to the nationalities.
රාජධානී නගර ජාතිකත්වයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
மாநகரங்களையும் தேசியத்துவங்களையும் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: He eats Sri Lankan food, he watches Sri Lankan movies, and he listens to Sri Lankan news.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: She eats Chinese food, she watches Chinese movies, and she listens to Chinese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Japanese food, she watches Japanese movies, and she listens to Japanese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Russian food, he watches Russian movies, and he listens to Russian news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Omani food, he watches Omani movies, and he listens to Omani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Pakistani  food,  she watches Pakistani movies, and she listens to Pakistani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats German food, he watches German movies, and he listens to German news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats French food, she watches French movies, and she listens to French news.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

examples.sentence: Which sentence describes the job of a food safety inspector?
options: He monitors the temperature of industrial ovens.
He ignores the temperature of industrial ovens.
He paints the temperature of industrial ovens.
examples.answer: He monitors the temperature of industrial ovens.

content.sentence: Which sentence describes the job of a food safety inspector?
options: He calibrates digital scales to guarantee accuracy.
He decorates digital scales to guarantee accuracy.
He hides digital scales to guarantee accuracy.
content.answer: He calibrates digital scales to guarantee accuracy.

content.sentence: Which sentence describes the job of a food safety inspector?
options: He supervises the sterilization of equipment.
He forgets the sterilization of equipment.
He damages the sterilization of equipment.
content.answer: He supervises the sterilization of equipment.

content.sentence: Which sentence describes the job of a food safety inspector?
options: He inspects hygiene standards in cold storage rooms.
He ignores hygiene standards in cold storage rooms.
He polishes hygiene standards in cold storage rooms.
content.answer: He inspects hygiene standards in cold storage rooms.

content.sentence: Which sentence describes the job of a food safety inspector?
options: He regulates the mixing of spices.
He destroys the mixing of spices.
He hides the mixing of spices.
content.answer: He regulates the mixing of spices.

content.sentence: Which sentence describes the job of a food safety inspector?
options: He checks the packaging line to maintain food safety.
He paints the packaging line to maintain food safety.
He abandons the packaging line to maintain food safety.
content.answer: He checks the packaging line to maintain food safety.

activity_b.text: He repairs dents and scratches on cars.
He fixes damaged doors, fenders, and bumpers.
He uses special tools to fit metal parts together.
He sands and smooths the car body.
He prepares the surface for painting.
He makes the car look new again.

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_b.text:
Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What does Priya prepare at the beginning?
options: She prepares the scaffolding.
She prepares the stainless-steel equipment.
She prepares the electrical cables.

Questions.question: What does she often weigh?
Questions.answer: He tests the horn, wipers, and indicators.
options: She weighs the cement bags.
She weighs the bricks.
She weighs the ingredients on the digital scale.

Questions.question: What does she never forget?
options: To paint the cupboards.
To label the containers.
To ignore the containers.

Questions.question: What does she frequently supervise?
options: The cutting of timber.
The mixing of ingredients.
The changing of tyres.

Questions.question: What does she always do before leaving?
Questions.answer: She cleans, sterilizes, and removes waste.
options: She decorates the tools.
She hides the waste food.
She cleans, sterilizes, and removes waste.

activity_b.text: Priya is a food technology trainee in the processing section.
She works in the kitchen laboratory every day.
She usually begins at eight o’clock.
She checks the duty list, washes her hands, and prepares the stainless-steel equipment.
She always follows the hygiene rules carefully.
Priya inspects the storage area, the freezers, and the ovens.
She often weighs ingredients on the digital scale.
She sometimes adjusts the temperature of the ovens or the pressure in the steam cooker.
She never forgets to label the containers with the date.
During every routine, Priya measures the pH level of food samples, checks the moisture content, and records the results.
She shows the readings to her instructor.
She frequently supervises the mixing of ingredients in the industrial blender.
At the end of the day, Priya cleans the work surfaces, sterilizes the tools, and stores them in the cabinet.
She always removes waste food and keeps the area tidy.
Priya enjoys her training because she learns professional standards and feels proud of her work.
